name: 侯慶辰
objective:
本課程講授英美契約法。其他資訊請參閱英文概述。
This course teaches basic rules of contract law applied in the United States. While contract law is a law of a state, this course does not focus on any specific jurisdiction. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.
schedule:
課程分成二個部分：
一、　　美國法律體系與契約法理論介紹
二、　　美國契約法案例導讀

課程授課方式：
第一部分採取傳統授課模式(lecture approach)，由講師介紹一遍美國法的重點。
第二部分與第三部分則採取蘇格拉底教學法(Socratic approach)，由講師分配案例給學生報告，於學生報告時講師將發問，借由問答方式激發學生的思維。


案例：
I. Mutual Assent
1.　　Lucy v. Zehmer (VA, 1954)
2.　　Stepp v. Freeman (Ohio, 1997)
II. Existence of an Offer
1.　　Lefkowitz v. Surplus Store (DE, 1957)
III. Agreements to Agree
1.　　Continental Labs v. Scott Paper Co (Iowa, 1990)
IV. Acceptance of an Offer
1.　　Day v. Caton (Mass, 1876)
V. Termination of the Power of Acceptance
Revocation by Offeror 
1.　　Petterson v. Pattberg (NY, 1928)
Lapse of Time 
1.　　Loring v. City of Boston (Mass, 1844)
2.　　Phillips v. Moor (ME, 1880)
Termination by Counteroffer 
1.　　Klocek v. Gateway (KS, 2000)
VI. Indefiniteness
1.　　Walker v. Keith (KY, 1964)
CONSIDERATION
1.　　Batsakis v. Demotsis (TX, 1949)
II. Forbearance as Consideration
1.　　Fiege v. Boehm (MD, 1956)
III. The Illusory Promise
1.　　Wood v. Lucy, Lady Duff-Gordon (NY, 1917)
IV. Past Consideration
1.　　Hayes v. Plantations Steel Co. (RI, 1982)
2.　　Mills v. Wyman (MA, 1825)
V. The Preexisting Duty Rule
1.　　Stilk v. Myrick (England, 1809)
2.　　Lingenfelder v. Wainwright Brewery (Missouri, 1891)
VI. Promissory Estoppel
1.　　Allegheny College v. National Chautauqua County Bank (NY, 1927)
